cd:Array.cd:Description: p,T and Height Correction Profiles MDS
Microwindows occupation matrices for p,T and trace-gas retrievals

cd:ProductVariable.name: num_dsd
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: $num_dsd = int(/mph/num_dsd)

cd:ProductVariable.name: num_ds
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: $num_ds = 9

cd:ProductVariable.name: ds_to_dsd_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: $ds_to_dsd_index[0] = index(/dsd, str(./ds_name) == "SUMMARY QUALITY ADS "); $ds_to_dsd_index[1] = index(/dsd, str(./ds_name) == "SCAN GEOLOCATION ADS "); $ds_to_dsd_index[2] = index(/dsd, str(./ds_name) == "DATASET STRUCTURE ADS "); $ds_to_dsd_index[3] = index(/dsd, str(./ds_name) == "SCAN INFORMATION MDS "); $ds_to_dsd_index[4] = index(/dsd, str(./ds_name) == "PT RETRIEVAL MDS "); $ds_to_dsd_index[5] = index(/dsd, str(./ds_name) == "O3 RETRIEVAL MDS "); $ds_to_dsd_index[6] = index(/dsd, str(./ds_name) == "H2O RETRIEVAL MDS "); $ds_to_dsd_index[7] = index(/dsd, str(./ds_name) == "MICROWINDOW OCCUPATION ADS "); $ds_to_dsd_index[8] = index(/dsd, str(./ds_name) == "PROCESSING PARAMETERS ADS ")

cd:ProductVariable.name: ds_available
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_ds - 1 do $ds_available[i] = if($ds_to_dsd_index[i] != -1 && !(bytes(/dsd[$ds_to_dsd_index[i]]/filename, 8) == "NOT USED"), 1, 0)

cd:ProductVariable.name: ds_offset
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_ds - 1 do $ds_offset[i] = 8 * int(/dsd[$ds_to_dsd_index[i]]/ds_offset)

cd:ProductVariable.name: num_dsr
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_ds - 1 do $num_dsr[i] = int(/dsd[$ds_to_dsd_index[i]]/num_dsr)

cd:ProductVariable.name: species_count
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: $species_count = 2

cd:ProductVariable.name: structure_info_next_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: $structure_info_next_index[$num_dsr[2] - 1] = -1; for i = $num_dsr[2] - 2 to 0 step -1 do $structure_info_next_index[i] = if(int(/dataset_structure_ads[i + 1]/ds_pointer[0]/dsr_offset) != -1, i + 1, $structure_info_next_index[i + 1])

cd:ProductVariable.name: structure_info_cum_num_dsr
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_dsr[2] - 1 do $structure_info_cum_num_dsr[i] = if(int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[0]/dsr_offset) == -1, if(i > 0, $structure_info_cum_num_dsr[i - 1], 0), if($structure_info_next_index[i] == -1, $num_dsr[3], if(i > 0, $structure_info_cum_num_dsr[i - 1], 0) + (int(/dataset_structure_ads[$structure_info_next_index[i]]/ds_pointer[0]/dsr_offset) - int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[0]/dsr_offset)) / int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[0]/dsr_length)))

cd:ProductVariable.name: info_structure_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_dsr[3] - 1 do $info_structure_index[i] = index($structure_info_cum_num_dsr, $structure_info_cum_num_dsr > i)

cd:ProductVariable.name: structure_pt_next_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: $structure_pt_next_index[$num_dsr[2] - 1] = -1; for i = $num_dsr[2] - 2 to 0 step -1 do $structure_pt_next_index[i] = if(int(/dataset_structure_ads[i + 1]/ds_pointer[1]/dsr_offset) != -1, i + 1, $structure_pt_next_index[i + 1])

cd:ProductVariable.name: structure_pt_cum_num_dsr
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_dsr[2] - 1 do $structure_pt_cum_num_dsr[i] = if(int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[1]/dsr_offset) == -1, if(i > 0, $structure_pt_cum_num_dsr[i - 1], 0), if($structure_pt_next_index[i] == -1, $num_dsr[4], if(i > 0, $structure_pt_cum_num_dsr[i - 1], 0) + (int(/dataset_structure_ads[$structure_pt_next_index[i]]/ds_pointer[1]/dsr_offset) - int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[1]/dsr_offset)) / int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[1]/dsr_length)))

cd:ProductVariable.name: pt_structure_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_dsr[4] - 1 do $pt_structure_index[i] = index($structure_pt_cum_num_dsr, $structure_pt_cum_num_dsr > i)

cd:ProductVariable.name: structure_vmr1_next_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: $structure_vmr1_next_index[$num_dsr[2] - 1] = -1; for i = $num_dsr[2] - 2 to 0 step -1 do $structure_vmr1_next_index[i] = if(int(/dataset_structure_ads[i + 1]/ds_pointer[2]/dsr_offset) != -1, i + 1, $structure_vmr1_next_index[i + 1])

cd:ProductVariable.name: structure_vmr1_cum_num_dsr
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_dsr[2] - 1 do $structure_vmr1_cum_num_dsr[i] = if(int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[2]/dsr_offset) == -1, if(i > 0, $structure_vmr1_cum_num_dsr[i - 1], 0), if($structure_vmr1_next_index[i] == -1, $num_dsr[5], if(i > 0, $structure_vmr1_cum_num_dsr[i - 1], 0) + (int(/dataset_structure_ads[$structure_vmr1_next_index[i]]/ds_pointer[2]/dsr_offset) - int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[2]/dsr_offset)) / int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[2]/dsr_length)))

cd:ProductVariable.name: vmr1_structure_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_dsr[5] - 1 do $vmr1_structure_index[i] = index($structure_vmr1_cum_num_dsr, $structure_vmr1_cum_num_dsr > i)

cd:ProductVariable.name: structure_vmr2_next_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: $structure_vmr2_next_index[$num_dsr[2] - 1] = -1; for i = $num_dsr[2] - 2 to 0 step -1 do $structure_vmr2_next_index[i] = if(int(/dataset_structure_ads[i + 1]/ds_pointer[3]/dsr_offset) != -1, i + 1, $structure_vmr2_next_index[i + 1])

cd:ProductVariable.name: structure_vmr2_cum_num_dsr
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_dsr[2] - 1 do $structure_vmr2_cum_num_dsr[i] = if(int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[3]/dsr_offset) == -1, if(i > 0, $structure_vmr2_cum_num_dsr[i - 1], 0), if($structure_vmr2_next_index[i] == -1, $num_dsr[6], if(i > 0, $structure_vmr2_cum_num_dsr[i - 1], 0) + (int(/dataset_structure_ads[$structure_vmr2_next_index[i]]/ds_pointer[3]/dsr_offset) - int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[3]/dsr_offset)) / int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[3]/dsr_length)))

cd:ProductVariable.name: vmr2_structure_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_dsr[6] - 1 do $vmr2_structure_index[i] = index($structure_vmr2_cum_num_dsr, $structure_vmr2_cum_num_dsr > i)

cd:ProductVariable.name: structure_mw_next_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: $structure_mw_next_index[$num_dsr[2] - 1] = -1; for i = $num_dsr[2] - 2 to 0 step -1 do $structure_mw_next_index[i] = if(int(/dataset_structure_ads[i + 1]/ds_pointer[10]/dsr_offset) != -1, i + 1, $structure_mw_next_index[i + 1])

cd:ProductVariable.name: structure_mw_cum_num_dsr
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_dsr[2] - 1 do $structure_mw_cum_num_dsr[i] = if(int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[10]/dsr_offset) == -1, if(i > 0, $structure_mw_cum_num_dsr[i - 1], 0), if($structure_mw_next_index[i] == -1, $num_dsr[7], if(i > 0, $structure_mw_cum_num_dsr[i - 1], 0) + (int(/dataset_structure_ads[$structure_mw_next_index[i]]/ds_pointer[10]/dsr_offset) - int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[10]/dsr_offset)) / int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[10]/dsr_length)))

cd:ProductVariable.name: mw_structure_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_dsr[7] - 1 do $mw_structure_index[i] = index($structure_mw_cum_num_dsr, $structure_mw_cum_num_dsr > i)

cd:ProductVariable.name: structure_param_next_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: $structure_param_next_index[$num_dsr[2] - 1] = -1; for i = $num_dsr[2] - 2 to 0 step -1 do $structure_param_next_index[i] = if(int(/dataset_structure_ads[i + 1]/ds_pointer[12]/dsr_offset) != -1, i + 1, $structure_param_next_index[i + 1])

cd:ProductVariable.name: structure_param_cum_num_dsr
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_dsr[2] - 1 do $structure_param_cum_num_dsr[i] = if(int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[12]/dsr_offset) == -1, if(i > 0, $structure_param_cum_num_dsr[i - 1], 0), if($structure_param_next_index[i] == -1, $num_dsr[8], if(i > 0, $structure_param_cum_num_dsr[i - 1], 0) + (int(/dataset_structure_ads[$structure_param_next_index[i]]/ds_pointer[12]/dsr_offset) - int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[12]/dsr_offset)) / int(/dataset_structure_ads[i]/ds_pointer[12]/dsr_length)))

cd:ProductVariable.name: param_structure_index
cd:ProductVariable.cd:Init: for i = 0 to $num_dsr[8] - 1 do $param_structure_index[i] = index($structure_param_cum_num_dsr, $structure_param_cum_num_dsr > i)
